fields.name: citations
fields.description: Number of times an article was cited in other articles present in the dataset.

fields.name: timescaledpagerank
fields.description: Time-rescaled node centrality calculated over the citation network.

fields.name: hindex
fields.description: Mean of the maximum values of h such that the given authors have published h papers that have each been cited at least h times.

fields.name: adopters
fields.description: Number of the unique citing authors in the current year.

fields.name: citationsperpaper
fields.description: Mean number of citations-per-paper of the authors.

fields.name: citationsperyear
fields.description: Mean number of citations per year of the authors.

fields.name: totalcitations
fields.description: Mean of the total citation count of the authors.

fields.name: totalpapers
fields.description: Mean of the total paper count of the authors.

fields.name: authorage
fields.description: Mean number of years since the first publication in the dataset for the authors.

fields.name: recentcoauthors
fields.description: Mean number of coauthors of each author in the current and antecedent years.

fields.name: venuecitatiosnperpapermean
fields.description: Mean number of citations per paper for journals published in by the authors.

fields.name: venuehindexmean
fields.description: Mean h-Index for journals published in by the authors.

fields.name: totalvenues
fields.description: Total number of journals published in by the authors.

fields.name: pagerank
fields.description: Mean PageRank score calculated on the unweighted coauthorship network.
